author: Tom Simonite
title: AI Uncovers a Potential Treatment for Covid-19 Patients
description: Software suggested an arthritis drug might quell an out-of-control immune response that damages the lungs. Now it's being tested in a clinical trial.
content: Late one January afternoon, British pharmacologist Peter Richardson ran out of his home office and told his wife, Got it! She asked what he was talking about and offered a cup of tea. Richardson explained that he had identified a drug that might help people i… [+5571 chars]
